title: ForeCastify
description: Forcastify is a music and weather application where you input your city, which then displays the forecast for that city and a relevant Spotify playlist to match the weather.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Work Day Scheduler is a productivity application that utilizes moment.js to help you keep your work day on track.

title: NoteTaker
description: NoteTaker is a note-taking app where you can add or remove notes to help keep track of your responsibilities. Deployed on Heroku, NoteTaker utilizes express to create the necessary routes for creating/saving, editing, or deleting your notes.
